item.description:
[b[i]]"THE LARGEST SINGLES DANCE ORGANIZATION IN NEW ENGLAND."[/i]

Saturday, JULY 10, at the Sheraton Colonial Hotel Grand Ballroom, 1 Audubon Rd, Wakefield, Exit 42 Salem St. off Rte. 128. (781)245-9300.
Complimentary hors dâ€™oeuvres 9-10.

www.se-4u.com.

business or party finery for women.
Info, call (781)446-0234.

OPEN TO THE PUBLIC; MEMBERSHIP NOT REQUIRED.
item.how_to_find_us: ASK FOR PAM AT THE DOOR.
